recipesJson.name: Sexy
recipesJson.author: iRaft
recipesJson.description: Inspired by SkiddlzNinja’s “God Milk”, I boosted the strawberry and swapped the TPA Cheesecake Graham Crust for INW Yes We Cheesecake because I’ve fallen in love with it ever since the Cheesecake episode of Noted. It’s a little creamier and less “crusty” than TPA but I think it works great in this recipe.

reviews.text: I like this much better than God's Milk. Great recipe.
